name: Generate Videos from Text or Images with Sora 2 AI - No Watermark

parameters.formDescription: Create stunning AI-generated videos from text descriptions or animate your images with AI. Powered by OpenAI's Sora 2 - No watermarks, professional quality output. Generate videos in landscape or portrait, standard or HD quality.

values.placeholder: Example: A serene mountain landscape at sunset with clouds moving slowly across the sky, golden hour lighting, cinematic camera movement, 4K quality, professional color grading

nodes.name: On form submission
nodes.notes: Form trigger: Users submit video requests via web form

nodes.name: Check: Has Image?
nodes.notes: Routes workflow based on whether user uploaded an image

nodes.name: Upload to ImgBB
nodes.notes: Uploads user image to ImgBB for hosting (required for Sora API)

nodes.name: Download Video (Text)
nodes.notes: Downloads the generated video from text-to-video path

nodes.name: Download Video (Image)
nodes.notes: Downloads the generated video from image-to-video path

nodes.name: Wait (Text)
nodes.notes: Wait 30 seconds for video generation to complete

nodes.name: Is Ready? (Text)
nodes.notes: Checks if video generation is complete, loops back to wait if not ready

nodes.name: TEXT TO VIDEO
nodes.notes: Sends text prompt to Sora 2 API for video generation

nodes.name: Wait (Image)
nodes.notes: Wait 30 seconds for image-to-video generation to complete

nodes.name: Is Ready? (Image)
nodes.notes: Checks if image-to-video is complete, loops back to wait if not ready

nodes.name: IMAGE TO VIDEO
nodes.notes: Sends image URL + prompt to Sora 2 API for image-to-video generation

parameters.content:
# üé¨ Sora 2 Video Generator - Setup Instructions

***Generate professional AI videos without watermarks in minutes!***

### üéØ What You Can Do:
‚ú® **Text-to-Video** - Type a description, get a video
‚ú® **Image-to-Video** - Upload an image, bring it to life
‚ú® **No Watermarks** - Clean, professional output
‚ú® **HD Quality** - Standard or high-definition options

### üìñ How to Use This Template:

**Step 1:** Read the **Setup Instructions** 
**Step 2:** Configure your API credentials (takes 5 minutes)
**Step 3:** Fill the form and watch the magic happen!

### üìã Setup Required:

**1Ô∏è‚É£ Get Kie.AI API Key (Required)**
   - Sign up at: https://kie.ai
   - Navigate to Dashboard ‚Üí API Keys
   - Copy your API key

**2Ô∏è‚É£ Configure n8n Credentials**
   - Go to: Credentials ‚Üí New Credential
   - Select: HTTP Header Auth
   - Name: `Kie Ai(Veo and more)`
   - Header Name: `Authorization`
   - Header Value: `Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE`
   - Save the credential

**3Ô∏è‚É£ ImgBB API Setup (For Image-to-Video)**
   - Get free key: https://api.imgbb.com/
   - Open "Upload to ImgBB" node
   - Replace the API key parameter (YOUR_ImgBB_API_KEY)
   - Note: Free tier has rate limits

**4Ô∏è‚É£ Telegram Bot (Optional - for notifications)**
   - Create bot with @BotFather
   - Get your Chat ID from @get_id_bot
   - Update chat ID in Telegram nodes (YOUR_CHAT_ID)
   - Or remove Telegram nodes if not needed

### üöÄ Quick Start:
1. Complete steps 1-3 above
2. Activate the workflow
3. Click "Test URL" in Form Trigger node
4. Fill the form and submit
5. Wait 30-60 seconds for video generation

### üí° Tips:
- HD quality takes longer than standard
- Use detailed prompts for better results
- Landscape works best for most content

---

**Created by:** bilsimaging.com
***Need Help or Advanced Setup:** contact@bilsimaging.com

## ÔøΩüìù TEXT-TO-VIDEO PATH

**This section handles video generation from text descriptions only.**

### üîÑ Flow:
1Ô∏è‚É£ **TEXT TO VIDEO** node sends your prompt to Sora 2 API
2Ô∏è‚É£ **Wait (Text)** pauses for 30 seconds
3Ô∏è‚É£ **Check Status (Text)** queries if video is ready
4Ô∏è‚É£ **Is Ready? (Text)** checks the response:
   - ‚úÖ If ready ‚Üí Goes to Download
   - ‚è≥ If not ready ‚Üí Loops back to Wait
5Ô∏è‚É£ **Download Video (Text)** fetches the final video
6Ô∏è‚É£ **Send Text to Video** delivers via Telegram (optional)

### üí° Key Points:
- Generation takes 30-120 seconds depending on quality
- Polling happens automatically every 30 seconds
- No image upload needed for this path
- Output is watermark-free MP4 file

### üìù Example Prompts:
*"A majestic eagle soaring over mountains at sunset, cinematic 4K"*
*"Time-lapse of flowers blooming, close-up, vibrant colors"*

## üñºÔ∏è IMAGE-TO-VIDEO PATH

**This section handles animating uploaded images.**

### üîÑ Flow:
1Ô∏è‚É£ **Upload to ImgBB** hosts the image and gets a URL
2Ô∏è‚É£ **IMAGE TO VIDEO** sends image URL + prompt to Sora 2
3Ô∏è‚É£ **Wait (Image)** pauses for 30 seconds
4Ô∏è‚É£ **Check Status (Image)** queries if video is ready
5Ô∏è‚É£ **Is Ready? (Image)** checks the response:
   - ‚úÖ If ready ‚Üí Goes to Download
   - ‚è≥ If not ready ‚Üí Loops back to Wait
6Ô∏è‚É£ **Download Video (Image)** fetches the final video
7Ô∏è‚É£ **Send Image to Video** delivers via Telegram (optional)

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Important:
- ImgBB API key must be configured (replace YOUR_ImgBB_API_KEY)
- Accepts JPG, PNG, WebP formats
- Image influences the video generation
- Same watermark-free output

### üí° Tips:
- Use high-quality images for best results
- Describe the motion you want in your prompt
- Portrait photos work great for this feature

## üîÑ WORKFLOW ROUTER

**This Switch node determines which path to take**

### üö¶ Decision Logic:
Checks if user uploaded an image:
- **NO IMAGE** ‚Üí Routes to TEXT TO VIDEO (upper path)
- **HAS IMAGE** ‚Üí Routes to Upload to ImgBB (lower path)

The workflow automatically detects binary data from the form's file upload field.

### üéØ How It Works:
The Switch node checks for the presence of binary data named `Upload_Starting_Image__Optional_`

**If binary exists** = User uploaded a file ‚Üí Take lower path
**If binary doesn't exist** = Text-only request ‚Üí Take upper path

üí° *Think of this as a traffic controller directing your request to the right generation method.*

## üì§ OUTPUT & DELIVERY

**Final step: Get your video**

### üì± Telegram Delivery (Optional):
**Setup:**
1. Replace `YOUR_CHAT_ID` with your actual Telegram Chat ID
2. Get it from @get_id_bot on Telegram
3. Create Telegram credential in n8n
4. Videos are sent as file attachments
5. Caption indicates which path was used (text or image)

### üîß Alternative Delivery Options:

**üìß Email Delivery**
**‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud Storage**
**üîó Webhook Response**


**üóëÔ∏è Don't Need Telegram?**
- Simply delete both Telegram nodes
- Connect Download nodes to your preferred output

For Advanced Setup: contact@bilsimaging.com
*Customize delivery based on your needs!*

## ‚öôÔ∏è POLLING MECHANISM

**Why the Wait ‚Üí Check ‚Üí Loop pattern?**

Sora 2 video generation isn't instant:
- ‚è±Ô∏è Standard quality: 30-60 seconds
- üé¨ HD quality: 60-120 seconds

### üîÑ How it works:

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Wait Node** (30 seconds)
   - Prevents immediate re-checking
   - Avoids API spam and rate limits
   - Gives video time to generate

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Check Status Node**
   - Calls Kie.AI API
   - Fetches current job status
   - Returns state information

3Ô∏è‚É£ **Is Ready? Node** (If condition)
   - Examines the `state` field from response
   - If `state == "success"` ‚Üí Video is ready!
   - If `state == anything else` ‚Üí Loop back to Wait

### ‚úÖ Benefits:
- ‚ú® Automatic retry until completion
- ü§ñ No manual intervention needed
- üö¶ API-friendly (respects rate limits)
- üì¶ Reliable delivery
- ‚è∞ Handles varying generation times


*This polling continues until your video is successfully generated!*

# üí° BEST PRACTICES & TIPS

### üìù Writing Great Prompts:

**Be Specific:**
‚ùå Bad: "A cat"
‚úÖ Good: "A fluffy orange cat playing with yarn, slow motion, warm lighting"

**Include Details:**
- Camera movement (pan, zoom, tilt)
- Lighting (golden hour, studio, natural)
- Style (cinematic, documentary, artistic)
- Technical specs (4K, professional grading)

**Example Prompts:**
üé¨ *"Aerial drone shot of ocean waves crashing on beach at sunset, cinematic 4K"*
üé® *"Time-lapse of paint mixing on canvas, vibrant colors, macro close-up"*
üåü *"Northern lights dancing over snowy mountains, long exposure, wide shot"*

### üéØ Quality Optimization:

**Standard Quality:**
- ‚ö° Faster generation (30-60s)
- üí∞ Lower cost
- ‚úÖ Good for testing prompts
- ‚úÖ Perfect for social media

**HD Quality:**
- üé¨ Better output (60-120s)
- üíé Higher cost
- ‚úÖ Professional use
- ‚úÖ Best for final deliverables

### üñºÔ∏è Image-to-Video Tips:

**Best Images:**
- High resolution (min 1080p)
- Clear subject focus
- Good lighting
- Interesting composition

**Describe Motion:**
- "Camera slowly zooms in"
- "Subject turns to face camera"
- "Wind gently moving hair"
- "Background slightly blurred"

# ‚ö° Advanced Prompt for Sora 2 :

**Transforms briefs into ad scripts for TikTok/Reels/Shorts:**
